**Test for associations between spectrum and overall survival (OS) and time to first-line treatment failure (TTF) in the MMRF CoMMpass data.**

```{r load_packages, message=F}
# Install and load required R packages
library(dplyr)
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
library(MASS)
library(survivalAnalysis)
```

#### 0. Load spectra (PC1-PC39) and clinical data
```{r}
dt.all = read.csv(file = "data/baseline-clinical-spectra-sd.csv")
```

#### 1. Overall Surival (OS)
```{r}
dt.os = dt.all %>% dplyr::select("SEQ_ID","ttcos","censos",starts_with("PC")) # subset
dt.os$censos = as.integer(dt.os$censos) # set variable type
os = analyse_multivariate(data = dt.os,
                           time_status = vars(ttcos,censos),
                           covariates = colnames(dplyr::select(dt.os,ends_with("_SD"))))
summary(os$coxph)
summary(os$coxph)$logtest

# count spectrum in model with p < .05
nsig = data.table(summary(os$coxph)$coeff[,"Pr(>|z|)"]) %>% subset(V1<0.05) %>% nrow()
print(paste0(nsig," spectrum significant at p < .05"))
```

#### 2. Time to first-line treatment failure (TTF)
```{r}
dt.tf = dt.all %>% dplyr::select("SEQ_ID","ttctf1","censtf1",starts_with("PC")) # subset
dt.tf$censtf1 = as.integer(dt.tf$censtf1) # set variable type
tf <- analyse_multivariate(data = dt.tf,
                           time_status = vars(ttctf1,censtf1),
                           covariates = colnames(dplyr::select(dt.tf,ends_with("_SD"))))
summary(tf$coxph)
summary(tf$coxph)$logtest

# count spectrum in model with p < .05
nsig = data.table(summary(tf$coxph)$coeff[,"Pr(>|z|)"]) %>% subset(V1<0.05) %>% nrow()
print(paste0(nsig," spectrum significant at p < .05"))
```

**Save model results**
```{r}
save(tf,os,file = "rdata/mod.disease-course.rdata")
```
